text: The Baptist Union of Great Britain (BUGB) is the both oldest and largest national group of Baptist churches in Great Britain. It was started when the General Baptists and Particular Baptists came together in 1891. == Other websites == *Baptist Union of Great Britain - official Web Site Category:Baptist Category:1891 establishments in Europe Category:1890s establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in the United Kingdom
title: Baptist Union of Great Britain
